messages.title: Phil Wilson: Labour's Local Man
messages.content: Phil Wilson Labour's local man called to see you today but unfortunately you were out. Phil says: 'During the Tory years unemployment was double today's figures. Home repossessions and business failures were at record levels. NHS waiting lists were 18 months long. There was no minimum wage, no pensioner credits, winter fuel allowance, new schools or new hospitals. Don't let the Tories back to ruin it again'

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Guarantee education for those between 18 and 24
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paid for by a tax on bankers' bonuses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Guarantee diagnosis within 1 week if your GP suspects you have cancer
Free personal care at home for those with the highest needs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tough action on families that create anti-social behaviour.
Focusing on growth, fair taxes and cuts in lower priority expenditure.
